original_title: Sri Lanka rupee closes at 322.45/60 to the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee closed at 322.45/60 to the US dollar on Thursday from 322.60/90 the previous day, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.06.2025 closed at 13.50/70 percent from 13.50/80 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.02.2026, closed at 13.75/85 percent from 13.80/90 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.01.2027 closed at 13.80/95 percent from 13.90/14.00 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.03.2028 closed at 14.15/25 percent from 14.10/20 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.07.2029 closed at 14.15/30 from 14.15/25 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2030 closed stable at 14.15/30 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2032 closed stable at 14.20/40 percent. (Colombo/Jan4/2024)
